uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon_util

Class KFileStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon_util.KFileStore

  • public class KFileStore
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides read/write access to an on-disk file-store, within which the files are assigned auto-generated names, based on common prefixes and suffixes and individual file-specific indexes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KFileStore(java.lang.String fileNamePrefix, java.lang.String fileNameSuffix)
      Constructor.

      Provides the file with the specified index.

      Provides the index of the specified file.
